Name: Setaria
Title: Crossing the Wall: Setaria
Desc: A genius from the desert, deep within the rainforest's temple...

Talent.Name: Setaria
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After either player performs any action, if you have 0 cards in your hand: </color>Draw 1 card.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
